pr_title: Added Style for TextViews in Add Podcast screen

timeline.message:
Added new style for add podcast screen TextViews

Signed-off-by: Darrell <mediumgeek@gmail.com>
Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/AntennaPod/AntennaPod into develop

timeline.bodyText: Please keep the indention of the untouched lines the same
timeline.author: ByteHamster
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -87,87 +87,57 @@
                     android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorPrimary"/>
 
             <TextView
-                    android:id="@+id/btn_add_via_url"
-                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
-                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
-                    android:drawablePadding="8dp"
-                    app:drawableStartCompat="?attr/feed"
-                    app:drawableLeftCompat="?attr/feed"
-                    android:paddingTop="8dp"
-                    android:paddingBottom="8dp"
-                    android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground"
-                    android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorPrimary"
-                    android:clickable="true"
-                    android:text="@string/add_podcast_by_url"/>
+                android:id="@+id/btn_add_via_url"

replies.bodyText: Sorry, I didn't notice that. It's fixed now.
replies.author: dev-darrell

replies.bodyText: Hmm, now the files are changed even more than before. To make it easier to read what your commit actually does, please keep the original formatting of the files, so that only the lines you actually changed are displayed on the "Files changed" tab.
replies.author: ByteHamster

timeline.message:
Arranged files to clearly show changes

Signed-off-by: Darrell <mediumgeek@gmail.com>

Finished file indentation and reformating

Signed-off-by: Darrell <mediumgeek@gmail.com>
